subject: HOTSAUCE speakers announced 🚨

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Join us in NYC for our first conference. Chris Do, Keisha Mabry, Rand Fishkin + other digital experience experts will be there.

Join the brightest minds in marketing, product, and ecommerce.


We're really excited to share our first wave of HOTSAUCE speakers with you. Expect diverse takes, plenty of conversation starters, and leave better equipped to build websites or products that people love.

Save 33% with an EARLY BIRD ticket now!
CLAIM DISCOUNT

OUR SPEAKERS SO FAR:

Keisha Mabry

Keisha Mabry is an author, speaker, and motivator who inspires people to build connections that change lives and transform careers.

Chris Do

Chris Do is a designer, educator, social media personality, director, and Emmy award winner, as well as the founder and CEO of The Futur.

Rand Fishkin

Rand Fishkin is an entrepreneur and digital marketing expert who is currently leading his newly founded company SparkToro.
